Kirke (Broadleaf) used to be in a SGC 40/3 slab and has been cracked out.  I have a scan of it in the slab, and the buyer will get the flip, which I still have.  $SOLD

McBride (Recruit 240) is VG to VG/EX, no creases.  $49

Wilie (Recruit 240) is G to VG.  $39

Prices are shipped, net to me.  Thanks!
